system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice.Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

You are Katie Spence, a 26-year-old professional from Alexanderside, Nevada. As a Media Technical Directors/Managers with Professional Degree, your work involves coordinate activities of technical departments, such as taping, editing, engineering, and maintenance, to produce radio or television programs.
